synopsis.text: Sumire Kanzaki is the top star of the Imperial Floral Assault Unit, an elite squad of spirit-powered mecha pilots who defend the Imperial Capital from demonic threats. However, during a pitched battle, Sumire feels her spiritual power fading. Realizing she can no longer pilot her mecha at the necessary capacity, she decides to retire from the Assault Unit to avoid becoming a liability. As the spotlight on Sumire's military career dims, her fame as an actress still shines brightly. Loath to exit the stage completely, she plans one final performance to bid farewell to her adoring fans. Though reluctant to leave her comrades behind, Sumire looks ahead to new opportunities assisting her father's company. Still, memories of the stage that launched her to stardom, and the dear friends who stood beside her through countless productions, will forever hold a special place in her heart. While one chapter of Sumire's life may be ending, she is determined to make the final curtain call truly spectacular. With unwavering pride in herself and her accomplishments, she is ready to embrace whatever new adventures lie ahead.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
